workflow.name: SAST Workflow
workflow.content:
jobs:
  static-code-analysis-go:
    asset_type: repo
    default: true
    if:
      languages:
      - go
    runner:
      setup:
        timeout_minutes: 10
      type: github_actions
    steps:
    - name: Run Go
      tags:
        links:
          github: https://github.com/jitsecurity-controls/jit-golang-code-scanning-control
          security_tool: https://github.com/securego/gosec
        security_tool: Gosec
      uses: ghcr.io/jitsecurity-controls/control-gosec-alpine:main
      with:
        args: -fmt=json -severity=high \${WORK_DIR:-.}/...
    tags:
      languages:
      - go
  static-code-analysis-java:
    asset_type: repo
    if:
      languages:
      - java
    runner:
      setup:
        timeout_minutes: 10
      type: github_actions
    steps:
    - name: Run semgrep java
      tags:
        links:
          github: https://github.com/jitsecurity-controls/jit-semgrep-code-scanning-control
          security_tool: https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep
        security_tool: Semgrep
      uses: ghcr.io/jitsecurity-controls/control-semgrep-alpine:main
      with:
        args: --json --config=/semgrep-java-config.yml --metrics=off --severity=ERROR
          \${WORK_DIR:-.}
    tags:
      languages:
      - java
  static-code-analysis-js:
    asset_type: repo
    default: true
    if:
      languages:
      - javascript
      - typescript
    runner:
      setup:
        timeout_minutes: 10
      type: github_actions
    steps:
    - name: Run semgrep javascript and typescript
      tags:
        links:
          github: https://github.com/jitsecurity-controls/jit-semgrep-code-scanning-control
          security_tool: https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep
        security_tool: Semgrep
      uses: ghcr.io/jitsecurity-controls/control-semgrep-alpine:main
      with:
        args: --json --config=/semgrep-ts-config.yml --metrics=off --severity=ERROR
          \${WORK_DIR:-.}
    tags:
      languages:
      - javascript
      - typescript
      - JS
      - TS
  static-code-analysis-python:
    asset_type: repo
    default: true
    if:
      languages:
      - python
    runner:
      setup:
        timeout_minutes: 10
      type: github_actions
    steps:
    - name: Run Bandit
      tags:
        links:
          github: https://github.com/jitsecurity-controls/jit-python-code-scanning-control
          security_tool: https://github.com/PyCQA/bandit
        security_tool: Bandit
      uses: ghcr.io/jitsecurity-controls/control-bandit-slim:main
      with:
        args: -r \${WORK_DIR:-.} -f json -q -lll -iii
    tags:
      languages:
      - python
  static-code-analysis-scala:
    asset_type: repo
    if:
      languages:
      - scala
    runner:
      setup:
        timeout_minutes: 10
      type: github_actions
    steps:
    - name: Run semgrep scala
      tags:
        links:
          github: https://github.com/jitsecurity-controls/jit-semgrep-code-scanning-control
          security_tool: https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep
        security_tool: Semgrep
      uses: ghcr.io/jitsecurity-controls/control-semgrep-alpine:main
      with:
        args: --json --config=/semgrep-scala-config.yml --metrics=off --severity=ERROR
          \${WORK_DIR:-.}
    tags:
      languages:
      - scala
name: SAST Workflow
trigger:
  true:
  - item_activated
  - resource_added
  - pull_request_created
  - pull_request_updated
  - merge_default_branch
  depends_on:
  - workflow-enrichment-code
